biotools.summary: Scaffolding genome sequence assemblies using 10X Genomics GemCode/Chromium data. This project is a new kmer-based (alignment free) implementation of ARCS. It provides improved runtime performance over the original ARCS implementation by removing the requirement to perform alignments with bwa mem.
